The word مِنْ comes from the root م ن and is associated with the meanings: From
The word فَمَا comes from the root م ا and is associated with the meanings:

data.meanings: to be, become strong, prevail, be able to do, be powerful, be vigorous, be forceful. quwwatun (pl. quwan) - power, strength, vigour, resolution, firmness, determination. qawun - desert. aqwa - to stay in desert. muqwin - dwellers of desert/wilderness (it is derived from the verb qawiya which means: it became desolate or deserted).
data.sentence: The word قُوَّةٍ comes from the root ق و ي and is associated with the meanings: to be, become strong, prevail, be able to do, be powerful, be vigorous, be forceful. quwwatun (pl. quwan) - power, strength, vigour, resolution, firmness, determination. qawun - desert. aqwa - to stay in desert. muqwin - dwellers of desert/wilderness (it is derived from the verb qawiya which means: it became desolate or deserted).
The word نَاصِرٍ comes from the root ن ص ر and is associated with the meanings: to assist/aid, succour, protect.
